experiences.company: Distribution of advertisement for Tommys Fönsterputs.
experiences.description: I physically drove around Stockholm distributing ads for a window cleaning company. Learned to plan work and route effectively, face various weather conditions and report my work.
I organised activities for children, took care of food for them and did some documentation. I learned a lot about cooperating with more or less difficult coworkers and children.

I installed car chargers (hardware, software, network, heavy cables, electrical assemblies, load balancers) for organisations and private owners. I also worked on smart house systems and LED lighting, both outdoor and indoor.

experiences.company: Distribution of advertisement for Tommys Fönsterputs.
experiences.description: I installed burglar alarm systems in very high-security places, like large hospitals, laboratories and server rooms. I took part in the construction of booths at big events. I also did electrical work that includes renovating the electrical part of old, delicate and exclusive historical buildings, apartments and offices. At times my work included administrative work, such as taking care of the company's economy, accountant tasks, organising and keeping track of storage content. Because of my very varied range of tasks I acquired traits, such as flexibility. While working for Burtec I got hired in by companies, such as Mysec, Adapt and DAEL.

references.text: 'You have worked hard and you are willing to learn new things. You are also inventive and solve problems, but you are also not afraid to ask for advice when you're unsure about something'
references.author: - Robert, Teamleader at DAEL

references.text: 'Jakub is motivated, action-oriented, punctual and has a good work ethic. Fulfills his duties(...) Jakub is humble, friendly and I can highly recommend him'
references.author: - Dawid, Teamleader at DAEL
